message: Assume that I create a group Alexlehm-ask-me and put that onto my blog page or something

I wonder if it would be a good idea to have write-only groups or rather groups that anybody can start a topic in, but only the owners can read them. this would work similar to an inbox, but would allow for a neat way to answer the questions (this means that the starter of a topic has to be able to read their own topic of course)
I like the idea of a widget-ized Convore group that someone could put on their blog/site... presumably you could do that with the API
heck, for some blogs, it might make sense to swap out the commenting system and have a Convore discussion group instead
yes, that is about what I was thinking of
